fields.name: Complete_check
fields.fieldText: Is this Data Capture Form Complete?

validationRule.errorMessage: Please complete the question.
Limit should be within 255 characters.
Hydrant UID should be within 10 characters.
Pre - Turbidity (NTU) 1 should be within 5 characters
Start Flow (lps) should be within 5 characters

validationRule.errorMessage: Comments should be within 500 characters.

fields.fieldText: Would you like to add another valve or delete a previous valve:

fields.fieldText: If you do not need to make any amendments, please select "Next"

fields.name: Warning
fields.fieldText: If you have made a mistake and need to amend, please delete the valve record and create a new one. Editing the values below will not save.

validationRule.errorMessage: 8 Digits min and max
8 character limit
10 character limit

fields.name: Normal_Position
fields.helpText: Select One

validationRule.errorMessage: Text should not be greater than 255 characters

validationRule.errorMessage: Pre-Turbidity (NTU) 1 should be within 5 characters

Post-Turbidity (NTU) should be within 5 characters

fields.name: DtextPostTurb
fields.fieldText: If the turbidity doesnt fall below 2NTU please call Network Control

fields.name: WorkStep_is_already_Completed_Do_you_still_want_to_fill_the_form_again
fields.fieldText: WorkStep is already Completed . Do you still want to fill the form again ?

validationRule.errorMessage: Hydrant UID should be within 10 characters.
Start Flow Volume (lps) should be within 5 characters.
Initial NTU within 5 minutes should be within 5 characters.
NTU at 15 mins should be within 5 characters.
NTU at 30 mins should be within 5 characters.
NTU at 45 mins should be within 5 characters.
NTU at 60 mins should be within 5 characters.

fields.fieldText: Was flow reduced to 1 lps after 30 minutes
